pages.text: Meteorites are scattered across the world surface. The bottom of islands in the End are made out of a similar material. The ores inside them can be mined for metal chunks that have a composition of iron and nickel. The chunks can be blasted into iron or used for invar tools.
Base meteorite material. Can be crushed into silicon and sulfur.
Material found in meteorites which has a composition of 90%Fe-10%Ni.
Material found in meteorites which has a composition of 80%Fe-20%Ni.
Material found in meteorites which has a composition of 60%Fe-40%Ni.
Material found in meteorites which has a composition of 50%Fe-50%Ni.
Material found in meteorites which has a composition very similar to diamond.
Similar to standard meteorite. Only found in the End.
